original_text:
The great day of the Lord is near—
    near and coming quickly.
The cry on the day of the Lord is bitter;
    the Mighty Warrior shouts his battle cry.
korean_text: 여호와의 큰 날이 가깝도다 가깝고도 빠르도다 여호와의 날의 소리로다 용사가 거기서 심히 슬피 우는도다

sentences.original_text: The great day of the Lord is near
The cry on the day of the Lord is bitter
the Mighty Warrior shouts his battle cry
sentences.korean_translation: 전능한 전사가 그의 전투 함성을 지른다
